title: Young Hearts
description: Torture, the one word Ellie Warner uses when referencing high school; most over-achieving, shy, awkward teenagers believe this to be true. Ellie’s lucky as she navigates each trial and tribulation of school drama with the help of her best friends Josie and Noah.As most teenage girls find a crush who are never aware of their longing desire, Ellie discovers hers in Logan Oliver. The deliciously brooding and devilishly handsome captain of the football team and most popular boy in school. But as big crushes go, he does not know Ellie exists.In a happenstance of error in Ellie’s judgement, she finds herself in detention with Logan. In the back of her mind, she wonders if he’ll see beneath her gawky exterior and discover the real beauty behind her dreams.
author: Jenna Michaelson
